settings.heading: ESSENTIAL CARE, MADE FOR MEN
settings.description: Our skincare is designed to keep your routine simple and effective. A lightweight, fast-absorbing cream designed to keep your skin hydrated, protected, and looking fresh all day. Packed with natural ingredients, it works to reduce dryness, calm irritation, and give your skin a healthier, more energized look. Simple, effective, and built for men.

settings.title: Born in Europe
settings.description: From the Netherlands, at the heart of Europe, we bring a tradition of quality, design, and innovation into modern men’s grooming. Our products are built to deliver confidence without compromise.

settings.title: VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE
settings.description: All of our formulas are 100% vegan and never tested on animals. We believe grooming should respect both people and the planet, ethical by design, from start to finish.

settings.title: BUILT WITH PURPOSE
settings.description: Every product is made with high-quality, skin-compatible ingredients selected for visible results and long-term skin health. No harsh chemicals, no unnecessary fillers, just clean formulas that perform.
